comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

Hello,

the Firefox 4 Beta has an drawing problem with the www.ledstyles.de Forum.

When you look on the Startpage at the latest Threads, there are problems in the view. In the Firefox 3.6 is it okay...

Reproducible: Always

comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.raw_text: This works with FF3.6.13 and Opera11.01 but it's broken with  Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110228 Firefox/4.0b13pre SeaMonkey/2.1b3pre
comments.text: This works with FF3.6.13 and Opera11.01 but it's broken with  Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110228 Firefox/4.0b13pre SeaMonkey/2.1b3pre
comments.author: bugzilla@mversen.de

comments.text:
I do see the problem in using my personal profile.  The problem does not
occur using the same Firefox build using a fresh profile.  Making the
font slightly smaller in Preferences triggers the problem for me.
I'm guessing the layout is correct given the styles on the page.
